title: Taos the Wizard Mouse
description: Taos is a mouse wizard with green eyes, who likes to solve different tasks using his magic knowledge. In the 4th book of Taos, the wizard starts a quest to find out what happened with the village' creek. The village was crossed by a little creek Which had its source on the mountain peak This is a graphical book and it is written in rhymes. It is a book that can be read on any hour, however, I recommend the bed night moment.
author: Evory Salieri
